title: Computer Science
description: Want to build the next Blockchain? Implement your own Binary Search Tree? Finally solve the mystery of the Big O Notation? The Open School of CS is a collection of courses curated from top universities and companies to help learners master all of the skills necessary in the field of Computer Science.

sections.title: Core Curriculum
sections.description: The Core Curriculum is where you will find the fundamental skills needed to be successful in Computer Science. Whether it's taking a deep dive into data structures or brushing up on your Assembly and compiler skills, your journey begins here!

sections.title: Tools
sections.description: Ready to put all of those hours of studying to use? Here you will find real world practical applications to expand on everything learned in the Core Curriculum. If you are ready to get your hands dirty building a Java Jeopardy game or a C++ card sorting app, you've come to the right place!
